thread.title: Did Iulia Vantur deliberately IGNORE Salman Khan’s ex-Katrina Kaif at Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception? Watch Video
thread.title_full: Did Iulia Vantur deliberately IGNORE Salman Khan’s ex-Katrina Kaif at Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception? Watch Video

author: Maggie Davis
title: Did Iulia Vantur deliberately IGNORE Salman Khan’s ex-Katrina Kaif at Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception? Watch Video
text: Did Iulia Vantur deliberately IGNORE Salman Khan’s ex-Katrina Kaif at Neil Nitin Mukesh’s wedding reception? Watch Video Read to know what Iulia Vantur did when Salman Khan's ex-Katrina Kaif arrived. By Maggie Davis | Published: February 18, 2017 9:53 AM IST Comments Iulia Vantur, Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini Sahay’s wedding was a royal affair. The wedding ceremony happened at the City of Lakes in Udaipur in a traditional Hindu style. The couple’s wedding reception for industry buddies took place at the JW Marriott Hotel in Mumbai for which many leading celebrities of B-town were invited. Amitabh Bachchan with wife Jaya Bachchan, Salman Khan , Katrina Kaif, Bipasha Basu with hubby Karan Singh Grover, Swara Bhaskar, Dino Morea, veteran actress Rekha and many others graced the occasion. The newlyweds Neil and Rukmini were spotted in colour-coordinated traditional outfit and they looked classy. Amidst this celebration mood, what caught attention was Salman’s ex-Katrina Kaif and Iulia Vantur’s appearance under the same roof. It is bound to happen when two popular ladies (who’s connected to Salman Khan specially) to be in spotlight when they attend the same event. The paparazzi just wait for that moment to capture their picture together. But here, that golden moment couldn’t be captured. Apparently everything was going smoothly until Ms. Kaif arrived at the venue. As per a report in BollywoodLife, Salman Khan’s alleged girlfriend Iulia Vantur and his former girlfriend arrived one after the other. The Romanian beauty arrived in Salman’s car, posed for the shutterbugs and went inside. Five minutes later, Kat arrived and went inside and within few minutes the Romanian beauty was spotted leaving the venue. Now we wonder, did Iulia deliberately ignore Katrina by making a quick exit. (ALSO READ: Neil Nitin Mukesh-Rukmini Sahay wedding: ALL Inside pics, videos and details from the gala event! ) Watch GRAND Entry and Exit & How CRAZILY People/Media r taking pix Of #SalmanKhan at @NeilNMukesh ‘s Reception (Feb 17th)! @BeingSalmanKhan pic.twitter.com/DEIw4YxZOv
